member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO
member.summary: Specifies a Direct3D 12 video feature or feature set to query about. When you want to query for the level to which an adapter supports a feature, pass one of these values to .

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_DECODE_SUPPORT
member.summary: Check if a decode profile, bitstream encryption, resolution, and format are supported. The result is a indicating the level of support. The associated data structure is .

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_DECODE_PROFILES
member.summary: Retrieve the list of decode profiles supported by the adapter. Call CheckFeatureSupport specifying the feature D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_DECODE_PROFILE_COUNT to get the number of profiles before calling CheckFeatureSupport for the D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_DECODE_PROFILES feature. The associated data structure is .

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_DECODE_FORMATS
member.summary: Retrieves the list of supported decode formats for a . Call CheckFeatureSupport specifying the feature D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_DECODE_FORMAT_COUNT to get the number of profiles before calling CheckFeatureSupport for the D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_DECODE_PROFILES feature.The associated data structure is .

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_DECODE_CONVERSION_SUPPORT
member.summary: Check if a colorspace conversion, format conversion, and scale are supported. The associated data structure is .

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_PROCESS_SUPPORT
member.summary: Retrieves the video processor capabilities. The associated data structure is .

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_PROCESS_MAX_INPUT_STREAMS
member.summary: Retrieves the maximum number of streams that can be enabled at the same time. The associated data structure is .

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_PROCESS_REFERENCE_INFO
member.summary: Retrieves the number of past and future frames required for a given deinterlace mode, filters, frame rate conversion, and features. The associated data structure is .

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_DECODER_HEAP_SIZE
member.summary: Checks the allocation size of a video decoder heap. The associated data structure is . For information on residency budgeting for heaps, see Residency.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_SIZE
member.summary: Checks the allocation size of a video processor heap. The associated data structure is . For information on residency budgeting for heaps, see Residency.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_DECODE_PROFILE_COUNT
member.summary: Retrieves the number of supported decoder profiles. The returned count is used when querying for D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_DECODE_PROFILES.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_DECODE_FORMAT_COUNT
member.summary: Retrieves the number of supported decoder profiles. The returned count is used when querying for D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_DECODE_FORMATS.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_ARCHITECTURE
member.summary: Indicates if the video engine is IO coherent with the CPU.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_DECODE_HISTOGRAM
member.summary: Retrieves the supported components, bin count, and counter bit depth for the a decode histogram with the specified decode profile, resolution, and format. The associated data structure is .

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR
member.summary: Retrieves the supported resolutions, search block sizes, and precision for motion estimation. The associated data structure is .

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR_SIZE
member.summary: Checks the allocation size of a motion estimator heap. The associated data structure is .

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_COUNT
member.summary: Retrieves the supported number of video extension commands. The associated data structure is .

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMANDS
member.summary: Retrieves a list of structures describing video extension commands. The associated data structure is .

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_PARAMETER_COUNT
member.summary: Retrieves the parameter count for the specified parameter stage. The associated data structure is .

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_PARAMETERS
member.summary: Retrieves a list of structures describing video extension command parameters for the specified parameter stage. The associated data structure is .

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_SUPPORT
member.summary: Queries for command-defined support information. The associated data structure is .

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_SIZE
member.summary: Checks the allocation size of a video extension command. The associated data structure is .

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO.D3D12_FEATURE_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR_PROTECTED_RESOURCES
member.summary: Checks support for motion estimation with protected resources. The associated data structure is .
